xyz.fsgik.common.base

类 FsChars

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.fsgik.common.base.FsChars

  • public class FsChars
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for char array, CharBuffer, Charset, etc.

      • defaultCharset

        public static java.nio.charset.Charset defaultCharset()
        Returns default charset: UTF_8.
        返回:
        default charset: UTF_8

      • systemCharset

        public static java.nio.charset.Charset systemCharset()
        Returns current system's charset. Generally is JVM environment 's charset not native charset.
        返回:
        current system's charset.
        另请参阅:
        nativeCharset()

      • nativeCharset

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable java.nio.charset.Charset nativeCharset()
        Returns charset of current native environment. Generally is charset of local native OS, not JVM charset.
        返回:
        charset of current native environment
        另请参阅:
        systemCharset()
